price: Enti wͻn ho atͻ wͻn wͻ Nyankopͻn trimu pͻ ho? Obi nnya abotͻyεmu wͻ Nyankopͻn tirimu pͻ ho, gyesε amanfoͻ a wɔabrε aguo no.
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُواْ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَلَا يَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū makra al-lahi falā yamanu makra al-lahi illā al-qawmu al-khāsirūna
